metadata.name: The Day Before The End Of The World.
metadata.description:
A spoken word, media rich poem by David Jones, internationally best selling author followed by over 285,000 poetry lovers on Instagram.

The poem explores how we view conflict and tragedy from a distance but how, as the shadows lengthen for one, they lengthen for us all. Animations and illustrations accompany the reader on their journey through the poem. Narration is by the author and is subtitled.

All proceeds will be donated to Ukraine as the country fights for its freedom and life. Please see Twitter for more information on the donation.
